lead_paragraph: The French luxury goods giant Louis Vuitton has ended its sponsorship of the America’s Cup after 24 years because of concerns that the event has become too commercial. The chief operating officer of America’s Cup Management, Michel Hodara, called the criticism an exaggeration.
